packages.name: MavensMate
packages.description: MavensMate for Sublime Text is a plugin that aims to replicate the functionality of the Eclipse-based Force.com IDE.
packages.author: joeferraro

osx.release_notes: Updates github URLs. Resolves Summer '14 Tooling API parsing issues. Introduces deploy compare (beta). OSX users: MavensMate.app 0.38.6 is available now. Release notes: http://mavensmate.com/Getting_Started/Release_Notes
